name: CJ Art Of Trading Membership Token
description:
Empowering Traders. Rewarding Commitment.

The CJ Art Of Trading Membership Token is a utility-based digital asset that grants members exclusive access to a wealth of trading knowledge, tools, and educational resources. Members receive tokens that can be redeemed for trading courses, strategy sessions, mentorships, and other learning opportunities designed to enhance their financial literacy and market mastery.

Built on the foundation of CJ Art of Trading’s mission, this token represents more than access — it symbolizes commitment to personal growth and financial independence through disciplined, informed trading.

frontendImplementation.purpose: Facilitates claiming the CJ Art Of Trading Membership Token (tokenId: 0) from the Edition Drop contract on Polygon using the React SDK.
frontendImplementation.instructions: Link your approved crypto wallet to the Polygon network and use the Claim Button on a CJ Art Of Trading Membership-approved site to complete KYC verification, securing your exclusive token effortlessly.
